name: Buddha's Sister
description: Buddha's Sister has a flavor like a tart cherry candy and a scent to match. A cross of Reclining Buddha, Afghani, and Hawaiian varieties, Buddha's Sister provides creative and cerebral effects. An 80/20 indica blend, itÂ does well grown in hydro or soil.
